product_name: K2 SuperSweet 74 Skis with Bindings - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: The K2 SuperSweet 74 women's skis with bindings use all-terrain rockered tips to help you progress beyond beginner runs to steeper terrain and faster turns. Rockered tips initiate turns easily and offer agile performance on all kinds of terrain, and slight camber underfoot offers tenacious edge hold on firm snow. Composite core provides a soft flex to get you accustomed to feeling how skis respond during each turn, and a shock-absorbent secondary core smooths out your ride. K2 women's skis also reduce the bulk and weight of all components to create very lightweight skis suited to the specific needs of female skiers. Integrated binding system allows the skis to flex fully from tip to tail for smooth turn initiation, hold and release. The K2 SuperSweet 74 skis with bindings feature DIN 3 - 10 release settings, a range suited to beginning and intermediate women skiers at medium to high speeds. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: The K2 SuperSweet 74 women's skis with bindings use all-terrain rockered tips to help you progress beyond beginner runs to steeper terrain and faster turns.
